TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpandCollapsePattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示以可视化方式展开显示内容，折叠隐藏内容的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that visually expand to display content and collapse to hide content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 聚合控件-使用用户界面提供展开/折叠功能的子对象生成 — 必须支持控件模式，而它们的子元素不能。Aggregate controls—built with child objects that provide the UI for expand/collapse functionality—must support the control pattern while their child elements do not. 例如，组合框控件是由列表框、按钮和编辑控件组合而成的，但它是唯一一个必须支持 的父组合框。For example, a combo box control is built with a combination of list box, button, and edit controls, but it is only the parent combo box that must support the . > [!NOTE] > 菜单控件，即使各菜单项的聚合是此规则的例外。A menu control, even though an aggregate of individual menu items, is an exception to this rule. 菜单项支持控件模式，但是父 menu 控件不。The menu items support the control pattern, but the parent menu control does not. 存在类似的例外适用于树和树项控件。A similar exception applies to the tree and tree item controls.

summary.span: 获取此 中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含控件模式中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用来获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Collapse() cil managed

summary.span: 隐藏 的所有子代节点、控件或内容。

span.span: Hides all descendant nodes, controls, or content of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个返回在折叠的 UI 自动化元素后的阻止方法。This is a blocking method that returns after the UI Automation element has been collapsed. 有某些情况下被标记为叶节点的 UI 自动化元素可能不知道它之前是否都有子级或调用方法。There are cases when a UI Automation element that is marked as a leaf node might not know whether it has children until either the or the method is called. 此行为是，可以使用树视图控件执行及其子项的延迟加载。This behavior is possible with a tree view control that does delayed loading of its child items. 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)]可能会显示一个节点的展开图标，即使当前没有任何子项目; 单击图标时，控件将轮询子项目、 无、 查找并移除展开图标。For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] might display the expand icon for a node even though there are currently no child items; when the icon is clicked, the control polls for child items, finds none, and removes the expand icon. 在这些情况下客户端应侦听属性更改事件上通过注册与一个事件处理程序的属性方法。In these cases clients should listen for a property-changed event on the property by registering an event handler with the method. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，UI 自动化元素表示菜单项传递给函数时，尝试以展开或折叠基于其当前的菜单项。In the following example, a UI Automation element representing a menu item is passed to a function that attempts to expand or collapse the menu item based on its current . [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#102)]

summary.span: 获取此 的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含此控件模式的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须从与以获取当前值的引用。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果获得使用，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取的任何属性的当前值引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用来获取一个属性，以前使用指定的缓存的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Expand() cil managed

summary.span: 显示 的全部子节点、控件或内容。

span.span: Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个在后返回的阻止方法已得到扩展。This is a blocking method that returns after the has been expanded. 有情况下，当，标记为叶节点可能不知道它之前是否都有子级或调用方法。There are cases when a that is marked as a leaf node might not know whether it has children until either the or the method is called. 此行为是，可以使用树视图控件执行及其子项的延迟加载。This behavior is possible with a tree view control that does delayed loading of its child items. 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)]可能会显示一个节点的展开图标，即使当前没有任何子项目; 单击图标时，控件将轮询子项目、 无、 查找并移除展开图标。For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] might display the expand icon for a node even though there are currently no child items; when the icon is clicked, the control polls for child items, finds none, and removes the expand icon. 在这些情况下客户端应侦听属性更改事件上通过注册与一个事件处理程序的属性方法。In these cases clients should listen for a property-changed event on the property by registering an event handler with the method. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，表示菜单项传递给函数时，尝试以展开或折叠基于其当前的菜单项。In the following example, an representing a menu item is passed to a function that attempts to expand or collapse the menu item based on its current . [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#102)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ExpandCollapseStateProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 仅表示直接子对象的可见性，而不表示所有后代对象的可见性。 refers to the visibility of immediate child objects only; it does not refer to the visibility of all descendant objects. 默认值为 。The default value is . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，根元素传递给返回的集合的函数[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]子代的根并符合一组属性条件的元素。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 模式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]传递给方法诸如若要从指定检索控件模式感兴趣的。The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，从 UI 自动化元素获取控件模式。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element. [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#101)]
